results.title: Simvastatin and Bezafibrate ameliorate Emotional disorder Induced by High fat diet in C57BL/6 mice
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Bezafibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001629 @@@Bezafibrate@@@ ameliorate @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@Emotional disorder@@@ Induced by High @CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@ diet in @CELLLINE_CVCL:C0MU @@@C57BL/6@@@ mice

results.title: Effects of simvastatin and 6-hydroxydopamine on histaminergic H1 receptor binding density in rat brains.
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can modulate histaminergic neurotransmission in the brain, and support the role of H1 receptors in @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@psychoneurological disorders@@@.

results.title: [Functional state of endothelium and oxidant activity of leucocytes in patients with ischemic heart disease after coronary bypass surgery].
results.text_hl: Combined @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ lowering therapy (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@) compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ alone demonstrated higher efficacy in terms of achievement of target @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ levels, improvement of endothelial function @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@and leucocytes disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Panov AV, Abesadze IT, Korzhenevskaia KV, Nil'k RIa, Kozulin VIu, Gordeev ML, Shliakhto EV. [Functional state of endothelium and oxidant activity of leucocytes in patients with ischemic heart disease after coronary bypass surgery]. Kardiologiia. 2007;47(4):32-6. PMID: 18260835
